selected_quotes: The Labour voter purge is just another slice of moderate authoritarianism #LabourPurge
It is apparently the centrist politicians' right to suppress those that threaten their hold on power
#LabourPurge - Proof that moderates can be authoritarians too
Academic: Labour's purging its infiltrators in name of moderation? That's absurd! #LabourPurge…

citation.abstract: If Labour really is turfing "infiltrators" out of its purportedly open leadership election, it's only proving that moderate centrism is often no such thing.
citation.title: Labour's voter 'purge' proves moderates can be authoritarians too
